personal.name: Prajwal P Amte
personal.title: Engineer
personal.bio: Engineering secure, scalable systems for real-world challenges.

items: Languages: Java, Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, C/C++, Rust
Version Control & CI/CD: Git, Jenkins, GitHub Actions
Frontend: React, Vite, AngularJS | Backend: FastAPI, Spring Boot, Node.js
AI/ML: TensorFlow, LangChain, PyTorch, OpenAI SDK
Testing: JUnit, Mockito, Pytest, Insomnia, Postman
Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, SQLite, Redis
Cloud & Containerization: AWS (Lambda, S3, EC2), Azure, Docker

experience.description: Working in Enterprise Cybersecurity focusing on Identity and Access Management (IAM). Developing full-stack solutions and implementing AI-driven use cases to enhance security infrastructure and access control mechanisms.

Developed a full-stack web application using Spring Boot (Java), Angular, and MySQL, deployed on Microsoft Azure. Contributed to building scalable backend services, integrating frontend features, and ensuring reliable cloud deployment.

Contributed to writing unit and integration test cases using JUnit and Mockito, and helped develop a serverless application with AWS Lambda and Java. Strengthened understanding of cloud-based backend development and test-driven design.

projects.title: Lumen - Document Processing System
projects.description: Built a document processing system with FastAPI backend and React/Vite frontend that performs OCR, parsing, and LLM-based extraction on PDFs and images. Implemented async job queue with Redis, structured data extraction, and real-time status tracking with cache-first result delivery.

projects.title: Aegis InfraGuard - Cloud Infrastructure CLI
projects.description: Developed a production-grade CLI tool for cloud infrastructure analysis featuring Terraform configuration parsing, AWS cost estimation for 30+ resource variants, Rego-based policy enforcement, and runtime metrics analysis with statistical anomaly detection and automated rightsizing recommendations.

projects.title: Finora - Finance Tracker
projects.description: Developing a modular personal finance management platform with automated investment price tracking (via Yahoo Finance API), dashboard-based expense analytics, and support for SIPs, loans, and manual expense entry. Backend is containerized using Spring Boot and PostgreSQL with Docker Compose, following a service-oriented architecture. Provides clean UI, separated modules for investments and expenses, and supports future extensibility.

projects.title: QuantScope
projects.description: Designed an AI-powered global market analysis tool combining LangChain and GenAI to generate insights on stocks and macro trends. Implemented interactive charts, real-time data visualization, and technical indicators for investors.

volunteer.description: Help to connect with students and Student branches, organizing impactful events to bridge the gap between academia and industry. Foster collaboration and knowledge sharing within the IEEE community.

Facilitated collaboration and membership growth among student branches through meetups and initiatives. Revived dormant branches and organized subsection-wide events, fostering communication and leadership.
Managed finances and supported 90+ events, enhancing operations and member engagement. Strengthened branch visibility and streamlined resource allocation effectively.
